products.name: PlayStation 2 USB Modded Console
products.description: The PlayStation® 2 generation included giant steps forward in home console gaming, with augmented reality, online multiplayer gaming, and more ambitious, large-scale games on DVD discs. Offering users cutting-edge gaming, DVD playback, online functionality, and backward compatibility with original PlayStation discs, the PS2 console represented an irresistible package at launch and throughout its lifespan. The PS2 library is one of the most diverse and expansive in gaming history, with thousands of titles spanning every genre imaginable, from iconic franchises to hidden gems. The console's longevity and continued popularity among gamers worldwide are a testament to its enduring appeal and the unforgettable experiences it provided.

products.name: PlayStation 3 Slim 500gb ( Refurbuished )
products.description: The PlayStation® 3 era built on the legacy of previous generations with incredible leaps forward in online gaming and digital services, while the arrival of Blu-ray Disc games allowed creators to expand their ambitions and build truly immersive game worlds on a grand scale. The PS3 console delivered cutting-edge graphics, a robust online ecosystem, and multimedia capabilities that transformed the living room experience. As well as introducing gamers to incredible single-player adventures and revolutionary online experiences, PS3™ became an entertainment mainstay in owners’ homes thanks to new music and movie streaming apps, and easily accessible digital games via the new PlayStation™ Store. The PS3 library is known for its diverse range of titles, including exclusive franchises and innovative gameplay experiences that pushed the boundaries of gaming technology.

products.name: AE 14 Pin Power Flex Cable for Sony PS4 Playstation 4 Controller
products.description: High-quality 14-pin power flex cable replacement for Sony PS4 DualShock 4 controllers. Essential repair part for fixing charging issues, power connection problems, and controller functionality. This AE-TECH power flex cable ensures reliable power transmission and stable charging performance. Compatible with PlayStation 4 controllers, easy to install with basic soldering skills.

This AE-TECH replacement kit includes the D-Pad, conductive film, and buttons, providing soft, durable, and high sensitivity repair components. Essential for fixing unresponsive or sticky buttons, restoring controller functionality. Compatible with JDS-050 and JDS-055 controller versions, easy installation with proper disassembly.
specs: Compatible with PS4 JDS-050 and JDS-055 Controllers

products.name: AE Replacement Analog Joystick Cap for PS4 PlayStation 4 Wireless Controller Remote V1
products.description: Premium replacement analog joystick caps for PlayStation 4 DualShock 4 wireless controller V1 models. These AE-TECH analog caps restore worn or damaged thumbsticks to factory-fresh condition. Featuring enhanced grip texture and durable construction, these caps provide superior control during intense gaming sessions. Perfect replacement for controllers with drift issues, worn rubber, or loose analog sticks. Easy DIY installation compatible with PS4 V1 controller models.

products.name: AE Replacement PS5 Board Button Flex Cable for PS5 Wireless Controller - V3.0 BDM-030 & BDM-040

products.name: AE PS2 & PS3 AV CVBS to 3RCA Cable For Sony Ps2 & Ps3 Console – Composite AV Cable
products.description: This AE-TECH Play Station AV CABLE PS AV Cable is made with high quality materials to ensure durability and video quality are met. This AV cable is compatible with multiple PlayStation models, including PS1, PS2, PS2 slim, PS3, and PS3 slim. Simply plug this AV cable into your Play Station and then into your TV’s corresponding inputs. Outputs at standard resolution. Ultra thick and flexible jacket with color coded connectors to simplify installation.
specs: Compatible with PS1, PS2, PS2 slim, PS3, and PS3 slim.
High-quality materials for durability and video quality.

products.name: AE PS2 to HDMI Converter Adapter with 3.5mm Audio Output, High-Definition PS2 HDMI Cable Compatible with All ps2 Models
products.description: This AE-TECH PS2 to HDMI Converter Adapter allows you to connect your PlayStation 2 console to modern HDTVs and monitors via HDMI. It supports all PS2 display modes (NTSC 480i/480p, PAL 576i) and provides high-definition video output without any loss in quality. The adapter also features a 3.5mm audio output for connecting headphones or external speakers, ensuring an immersive gaming experience. Easy to set up and use, this converter is compatible with all PS2 models, making it a versatile accessory for retro gaming enthusiasts.
specs: Supports all PS2 display modes (NTSC 480i/480p, PAL 576i)
3.5mm audio output for headphones or external speakers
